title: EastEnders spoilers: Ben and Martin team up tonight
text:
With Ben Mitchell’s (Max Bowden) dodgy dealings having gone awry in EastEnders, he finds himself teaming-up with an adversary tonight in the form of Martin Fowler (James Bye) in order to rescue Lola Pearce (Danielle Harold) from the clutches of the Panesar clan.

After learning of daughter Bex’s (Jasmine Armfield) suicide attempt, Martin wasted little time in returning to Walford. During last night’s episode, he made a promise to the young girl, telling her that he was home for good. Of course, moments later, he was confronted with arch-enemy Ben, as the two faced off across the Square.

In tonight’s episode, Martin sets about orchestrating a plan which would allow both him and Stacey (Lacey Turner) to return home permanently— and that means that he must pay Ben a visit.

Martin pleads with Ben to allow Stacey to return to Walford. However, as Ben contemplates Martin’s request, he receives a threatening phone call from Jags (Amar Adatia) — who reveals that he’s kidnapped Lola.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Desperate to save the mother of his daughter, Ben makes Martin a deal, telling him that if he helps to get Lola back safely, he’ll wipe the slate clean in return and thus allow Stacey to return home.

Will Martin agree to Ben’s terms?

If so, will they be able to successfully rescue Lola?

Will Ben remain true to his word?

EastEnders continues on Tuesday 8th October at 7:30pm on BBC One.
